means: 利用，使用( utilize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In the 19 th century waterpower was widely utilized to generate electricity.
sentence.Network_cn: 在19世纪人们大规模使用水力来发电.

sentence.Network_en: The empty building can be utilized for city storage.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以利用那栋空建筑物作城市的仓库.

sentence.Network_en: They utilized water for producing electric power.

entry.def: If you utilize something, you use it.

example.ex: Sound engineers utilize a range of techniques to enhance the quality of the recordings...
example.tran: 音响师运用一系列技术来提高录音质量。

example.ex: Minerals can be absorbed and utilized by the body in a variety of different forms.
example.tran: 人体可通过很多不同形式吸收和利用矿物质。
